code:
# @param {Integer[]} nums
# @param {Integer} target
# @return {Integer}
def min_operations(nums, target)
    sum = nums.sum
    return -1 if sum < target

    count = 0
    nums.sort!.reverse!
    nums.each_with_index do |num, index|
        next if num > target
        while num <= target && target > 0
            target -= num
            count += 1
            break if target == 0
        end
        break if target == 0
    end

    ops = 0
    while sum > target
        doubled = false
        nums.each_with_index do |num, i|
            if num > 1 && (sum - num + num / 2) >= target
                sum -= num - num / 2
                nums[i] = num / 2
                nums.push(num / 2)
                ops += 1
                doubled = true
                break
            end
        end
        break unless doubled
    end

    ops + count
end
